WrestlerMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
WrestlerMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
WrestlerMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

WrestlerMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
WrestlerMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !WrestlerMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

WrestlerMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
WrestlerMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkil.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !WrestlerMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

WrestlerMod:AtomicDrop.NAME: Atomic Drop
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: you attack the enemy this turn, gain [E].

WrestlerMod:Brainbuster.NAME: Brainbuster
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: you attack that enemy this turn, draw 1 card.

WrestlerMod:CheapShot.NAME: Cheap Shot
WrestlerMod:CheapShot.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

WrestlerMod:CurtainJerker.NAME: Curtain Jerker
WrestlerMod:CurtainJerker.DESCRIPTION: The next time you're attacked, the attacker becomes Grappled at the start of your next turn.

WrestlerMod:FanFavorite.NAME: Fan Favorite
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Attacks in a single turn, gain !M! Block.

WrestlerMod:FrogSplash.NAME: Frog Splash
WrestlerMod:FrogSplash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

WrestlerMod:Hardway.NAME: Hardway
WrestlerMod:Hardway.DESCRIPTION: Remove all of the enemy's debuffs. NL They lose 1 Strength for each debuff removed. NL Exhaust.

WrestlerMod:Headlock.NAME: Headlock
WrestlerMod:Headlock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength until end of turn.

WrestlerMod:HeelTurn.NAME: Heel Turn
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Strength. NL Gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

WrestlerMod:OffTheRopes.NAME: Off the Ropes
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Attack from your discard pile to your hand.
Choose an Attack to Add to Your Hand.
Attack to Add to Your Hand.

WrestlerMod:SafetyTag.NAME: Safety Tag
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: on the bottom of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

WrestlerMod:Scrapper.NAME: Scrapper
WrestlerMod:Scrapper.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if an enemy is Grappled, gain !M! Strength.

WrestlerMod:Sharpshooter.NAME: Sharpshooter
WrestlerMod:Sharpshooter.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Choked. NL Deal !D! Damage for each debuff applied to the enemy.

WrestlerMod:SideRoll.NAME: SideRoll
WrestlerMod:SideRoll.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard 1 card. NL If you discarded an Attack this way, Draw 1 card.

WrestlerMod:SquareOff.NAME: Square Off
WrestlerMod:SquareOff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL If you attack that enemy twice this turn, apply Grappled.

WrestlerMod:TakeToTheMat.NAME: Take to the Mat
WrestlerMod:TakeToTheMat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If the enemy has !M! % health or less, they become Grappled.

WrestlerMod:TornadoTag.NAME: Tornado Tag
WrestlerMod:TornadoTag.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Put a
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: on the bottom of your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
